FuncDef:
The inner-type ipv4 command is used to configure the original packet support type that the SFF sends to the SF.
The undo inner-type ipv4 command is used to remove the original packet support type configured by the SFF.
By default, the original packet support type sent by the SFF to the SF is not configured.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
This command is used to configure the original packet support type that the SFF sends to the SF. Currently, the SRv6 service chain only supports IPv4 types.
